014package org.gbif.predicate.query;
015
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
018import java.lang.reflect.Method;
019import java.time.LocalDate;
020import java.util.*;
021import java.util.function.Function;
022import java.util.stream.Collectors;
023import lombok.Data;
024import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
025import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
026import org.apache.lucene.search.join.ScoreMode;
027import org.elasticsearch.common.geo.ShapeRelation;
028import org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.CoordinatesBuilder;
029import org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.LineStringBuilder;
030import org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.MultiPolygonBuilder;
031import org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.PointBuilder;
032import org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.PolygonBuilder;
033import org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.ShapeBuilder;
034import org.elasticsearch.index.query.BoolQueryBuilder;
035import org.elasticsearch.index.query.GeoDistanceQueryBuilder;
036import org.elasticsearch.index.query.GeoShapeQueryBuilder;
037import org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder;
038import org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders;
039import org.elasticsearch.index.query.RangeQueryBuilder;
040import org.elasticsearch.index.query.TermsQueryBuilder;
041import org.gbif.api.exception.QueryBuildingException;
042import org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter;
043import org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.geo.DistanceUnit;
044import org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter;
045import org.gbif.api.model.predicate.*;
046import org.gbif.api.query.QueryVisitor;
047import org.gbif.api.util.IsoDateInterval;
048import org.gbif.api.util.IsoDateParsingUtils;
049import org.gbif.api.util.Range;
050import org.gbif.api.util.SearchTypeValidator;
051import org.gbif.api.util.VocabularyUtils;
052import org.gbif.api.vocabulary.Country;
053import org.locationtech.jts.geom.Coordinate;
054import org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry;
055import org.locationtech.jts.geom.Polygon;
056import org.locationtech.jts.io.ParseException;
057import org.locationtech.jts.io.WKTReader;

059/**
060 * The class translates predicates in GBIF download API to equivalent Elasticsearch query requests.
061 * The json string provided by {@link #buildQuery(Predicate)} can be used with _search get requests
062 * of ES index to produce downloads.
063 */
064@RequiredArgsConstructor
065@Slf4j
066public abstract class EsQueryVisitor<S extends SearchParameter> implements QueryVisitor {
067
068  private final EsFieldMapper<S> esFieldMapper;
069  private final String defaultChecklistKey;
070
071  private String getChecklistKey(Predicate predicate) {
072
073    if (predicate == null) return null;
074
075    Class<?> clazz = predicate.getClass();
076
077    try {
078      Method m = clazz.getMethod("getChecklistKey");
079      String checklistKey = (String) m.invoke(predicate);
080      if (checklistKey != null) return checklistKey;
081      return defaultChecklistKey;
082    } catch (Exception e) {
083      return null;
084    }
085  }
086
087  private String getExactMatchFieldName(IsNotNullPredicate<S> predicate) {
088    if (esFieldMapper.isTaxonomic(predicate.getParameter())) {
089      return esFieldMapper.getChecklistField(getChecklistKey(predicate), predicate.getParameter());
090    }
091
092    return esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(predicate.getParameter());
093  }
094
095  private String getExactMatchFieldName(IsNullPredicate<S> predicate) {
096    if (esFieldMapper.isTaxonomic(predicate.getParameter())) {
097      return esFieldMapper.getChecklistField(getChecklistKey(predicate), predicate.getParameter());
098    }
099
100    return esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(predicate.getParameter());
101  }
102
103  private String getExactMatchOrVerbatimField(SimplePredicate<S> predicate) {
104    if (predicate instanceof EqualsPredicate) {
105      EqualsPredicate<S> equalsPredicate = (EqualsPredicate<S>) predicate;
106      if (esFieldMapper.isTaxonomic(equalsPredicate.getKey())) {
107        return esFieldMapper.getChecklistField(
108            getChecklistKey(equalsPredicate), predicate.getKey());
109      }
110    }
111    if (predicate instanceof LikePredicate) {
112      LikePredicate<S> likePredicate = (LikePredicate<S>) predicate;
113      if (esFieldMapper.isTaxonomic(likePredicate.getKey())) {
114        return esFieldMapper.getChecklistField(getChecklistKey(likePredicate), predicate.getKey());
115      }
116    }
117
118    return predicate.isMatchCase()
119        ? esFieldMapper.getVerbatimFieldName(predicate.getKey())
120        : esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(predicate.getKey());
121  }
122
123  private String getExactMatchOrVerbatimField(InPredicate<S> predicate) {
124    if (esFieldMapper.isTaxonomic(predicate.getKey())) {
125      return esFieldMapper.getChecklistField(getChecklistKey(predicate), predicate.getKey());
126    }
127
128    return Optional.ofNullable(predicate.isMatchCase()).orElse(Boolean.FALSE)
129        ? esFieldMapper.getVerbatimFieldName(predicate.getKey())
130        : esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(predicate.getKey());
131  }
132
133  private String parseParamValue(String value, S parameter) {
134    if (Enum.class.isAssignableFrom(parameter.type())
135        && !Country.class.isAssignableFrom(parameter.type())) {
136      return VocabularyUtils.lookup(value, (Class<Enum<?>>) parameter.type())
137          .map(Enum::name)
138          .orElse(null);
139    }
140    if (Boolean.class.isAssignableFrom(parameter.type())) {
141      return value.toLowerCase();
142    }
143    return value;
144  }
145
146  /**
147   * Translates a valid {@link org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Download} object and translates it into
148   * a json query that can be used as the <em>body</em> for _search request of ES index.
149   *
150   * @param predicate to translate
151   * @return body clause
152   */
153  @Override
154  public String buildQuery(Predicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
155    return getQueryBuilder(predicate).orElse(QueryBuilders.matchAllQuery()).toString();
156  }
157
158  /**
159   * Translates a valid {@link org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Download} object and translates it into
160   * a json query that can be used as the <em>body</em> for _search request of ES index.
161   *
162   * @param predicate to translate
163   * @return body clause
164   */
165  public Optional<QueryBuilder> getQueryBuilder(Predicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
166    if (predicate != null) {
167      BoolQueryBuilder queryBuilder = QueryBuilders.boolQuery();
168      visit(predicate, new QueryData(queryBuilder));
169      return Optional.of(queryBuilder);
170    }
171    return Optional.empty();
172  }
173
174  /**
175   * handle conjunction predicate
176   *
177   * @param predicate conjunction predicate
178   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
179   */
180  public void visit(ConjunctionPredicate predicate, QueryData queryData) {
181    // must query structure is equivalent to AND
182    Map<String, List<QueryBuilder>> queriesByNestedPath = new HashMap<>();
183    boolean nonNestedQueriesFound = false;
184
185    for (Predicate subPredicate : predicate.getPredicates()) {
186      try {
187        BoolQueryBuilder mustQueryBuilder = QueryBuilders.boolQuery();
188        QueryData mustQueryData = new QueryData(mustQueryBuilder);
189        visit(subPredicate, mustQueryData);
190
191        if (mustQueryData.isNested()) {
192          queriesByNestedPath
193              .computeIfAbsent(mustQueryData.nestedPath, k -> new ArrayList<>())
194              .add(addNullableFieldPredicate(subPredicate, mustQueryData.rawQueries.get(0)));
195        } else {
196          queryData.queryBuilder.filter(addNullableFieldPredicate(subPredicate, mustQueryBuilder));
197          nonNestedQueriesFound = true;
198        }
199
200      } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
201        throw new RuntimeException(ex);
202      }
203    }
204
205    for (Map.Entry<String, List<QueryBuilder>> entry : queriesByNestedPath.entrySet()) {
206      String key = entry.getKey();
207      List<QueryBuilder> value = entry.getValue();
208      BoolQueryBuilder nestedBoolQuery = QueryBuilders.boolQuery();
209      value.forEach(q -> nestedBoolQuery.filter().add(q));
210      queryData
211          .queryBuilder
212          .filter()
213          .add(QueryBuilders.nestedQuery(key, nestedBoolQuery, ScoreMode.None));
214      queryData.nestedPath = !nonNestedQueriesFound ? key : null;
215      queryData.rawQueries = nestedBoolQuery.filter();
216    }
217  }
218
219  /**
220   * handle disjunction predicate
221   *
222   * @param predicate disjunction predicate
223   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
224   */
225  public void visit(DisjunctionPredicate predicate, QueryData queryData) {
226    Map<S, List<EqualsPredicate<S>>> equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn = groupEquals(predicate);
227
228    Map<String, List<QueryBuilder>> queriesByNestedPath = new HashMap<>();
229    boolean nonNestedQueriesFound = false;
230
231    for (Predicate subPredicate : predicate.getPredicates()) {
232      try {
233        if (!isReplaceableByInPredicate(subPredicate, equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn)) {
234          BoolQueryBuilder shouldQueryBuilder = QueryBuilders.boolQuery();
235          QueryData shouldQueryData = new QueryData(shouldQueryBuilder);
236          visit(subPredicate, shouldQueryData);
237          QueryBuilder q = addNullableFieldPredicate(subPredicate, shouldQueryBuilder);
238
239          if (shouldQueryData.isNested()) {
240            queriesByNestedPath
241                .computeIfAbsent(shouldQueryData.nestedPath, k -> new ArrayList<>())
242                .addAll(shouldQueryData.rawQueries);
243          } else {
244            nonNestedQueriesFound = true;
245            queryData.queryBuilder.should(q);
246          }
247
248          if (subPredicate instanceof SimplePredicate) {
249            equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn.remove(((SimplePredicate) subPredicate).getKey());
250          }
251        }
252      } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
253        throw new RuntimeException(ex);
254      }
255    }
256
257    for (Map.Entry<String, List<QueryBuilder>> e : queriesByNestedPath.entrySet()) {
258      String s = e.getKey();
259      List<QueryBuilder> builders = e.getValue();
260      BoolQueryBuilder nestedBoolQuery = QueryBuilders.boolQuery();
261      builders.forEach(q -> nestedBoolQuery.should().add(q));
262      queryData
263          .queryBuilder
264          .should()
265          .add(QueryBuilders.nestedQuery(s, nestedBoolQuery, ScoreMode.None));
266      queryData.nestedPath = !nonNestedQueriesFound ? s : null;
267      queryData.rawQueries = nestedBoolQuery.should();
268    }
269
270    if (!equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn.isEmpty()) {
271      Optional<S> geoTimeParam = getParam(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME.name());
272      if (geoTimeParam.isPresent()
273          && equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn.containsKey(geoTimeParam.get())) {
274        List<QueryBuilder> queryBuilders = new ArrayList<>();
275        equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn
276            .get(geoTimeParam.get())
277            .forEach(
278                ep -> {
279                  queryBuilders.add(
280                      QueryBuilders.termQuery(getExactMatchOrVerbatimField(ep), ep.getValue()));
281                });
282
283        if (!queryBuilders.isEmpty()) {
284          nonNestedQueriesFound = true;
285          queryData.queryBuilder.should().addAll(queryBuilders);
286        }
287
288        equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn.remove(geoTimeParam.get());
289      }
290
291      if (!equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn.isEmpty()) {
292        Map<String, List<QueryBuilder>> replaceableQueriesByNestedPath = new HashMap<>();
293        for (InPredicate<S> ep : toInPredicates(equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn)) {
294          TermsQueryBuilder termsQueryBuilder =
295              QueryBuilders.termsQuery(
296                  getExactMatchOrVerbatimField(ep),
297                  ep.getValues().stream()
298                      .map(v -> parseParamValue(v, ep.getKey()))
299                      .collect(Collectors.toList()));
300
301          if (esFieldMapper.isNestedField(ep.getKey())) {
302            replaceableQueriesByNestedPath
303                .computeIfAbsent(esFieldMapper.getNestedPath(ep.getKey()), k -> new ArrayList<>())
304                .add(termsQueryBuilder);
305          } else {
306            queryData.queryBuilder.should().add(termsQueryBuilder);
307            nonNestedQueriesFound = true;
308          }
309        }
310
311        for (Map.Entry<String, List<QueryBuilder>> entry :
312            replaceableQueriesByNestedPath.entrySet()) {
313          String key = entry.getKey();
314          List<QueryBuilder> value = entry.getValue();
315          BoolQueryBuilder nestedBoolQuery = QueryBuilders.boolQuery();
316          value.forEach(q -> nestedBoolQuery.should().add(q));
317          queryData
318              .queryBuilder
319              .should()
320              .add(QueryBuilders.nestedQuery(key, nestedBoolQuery, ScoreMode.None));
321          queryData.nestedPath = !nonNestedQueriesFound ? key : null;
322          queryData.rawQueries = nestedBoolQuery.should();
323        }
324      }
325    }
326  }
327
328  /** Checks if a predicate has in grouped and can be replaced later by a InPredicate. */
329  private boolean isReplaceableByInPredicate(
330      Predicate predicate, Map<S, List<EqualsPredicate<S>>> equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn) {
331    if (!equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn.isEmpty() && predicate instanceof EqualsPredicate) {
332      EqualsPredicate<S> equalsPredicate = (EqualsPredicate<S>) predicate;
333
334      // check it is not a range predicate e.g. YEAR 2000,*
335      if (SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(equalsPredicate.getValue())
336          || SearchTypeValidator.isDateRange(equalsPredicate.getValue())) {
337        return false;
338      }
339
340      return equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn.containsKey(equalsPredicate.getKey())
341          && equalsPredicatesReplaceableByIn
342              .get(equalsPredicate.getKey())
343              .contains(equalsPredicate);
344    }
345    return false;
346  }
347
348  /** Groups all equals predicates by search parameter. */
349  private Map<S, List<EqualsPredicate<S>>> groupEquals(DisjunctionPredicate predicate) {
350    return predicate.getPredicates().stream()
351        .filter(p -> p instanceof EqualsPredicate)
352        .filter(p -> ((EqualsPredicate<?>) p).getChecklistKey() == null)
353        .map(p -> (EqualsPredicate<S>) p)
354        .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(EqualsPredicate::getKey))
355        .entrySet()
356        .stream()
357        .filter(e -> e.getValue().size() > 1)
358        .collect(Collectors.toMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue));
359  }
360
361  /** Transforms the grouped EqualsPredicates into InPredicates. */
362  private List<InPredicate<S>> toInPredicates(Map<S, List<EqualsPredicate<S>>> equalPredicates) {
363    return equalPredicates.entrySet().stream()
364        .map(
365            e ->
366                e.getValue().stream()
367                    .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(EqualsPredicate::isMatchCase))
368                    .entrySet()
369                    .stream()
370                    .map(
371                        group ->
372                            new InPredicate<S>(
373                                e.getKey(),
374                                group.getValue().stream()
375                                    .map(EqualsPredicate::getValue)
376                                    .collect(Collectors.toSet()),
377                                group.getKey()))
378                    .collect(Collectors.toList()))
379        .flatMap(List::stream)
380        .collect(Collectors.toList());
381  }
382
383  /**
384   * handles EqualPredicate
385   *
386   * @param predicate equalPredicate
387   */
388  public void visit(EqualsPredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
389    S parameter = predicate.getKey();
390
391    QueryBuilder q = null;
392    if ((Number.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())
393            || paramEquals(predicate.getKey(), OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME.name()))
394        && SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(predicate.getValue())) {
395      Range<Double> decimalRange = SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(predicate.getValue());
396      RangeQueryBuilder rqb =
397          QueryBuilders.rangeQuery(esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(parameter));
398      if (decimalRange.hasLowerBound()) {
399        rqb.gte(decimalRange.lowerEndpoint());
400      }
401      if (decimalRange.hasUpperBound()) {
402        rqb.lte(decimalRange.upperEndpoint());
403      }
404
405      if (paramEquals(predicate.getKey(), OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME.name())) {
406        rqb.relation("within");
407      }
408
409      q = addNullableFieldPredicate(predicate, rqb);
410    } else if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())
411        && SearchTypeValidator.isDateRange(predicate.getValue())) {
412      // The date range is closed-open, so we need lower â‰¤ date < upper.
413      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
414      RangeQueryBuilder rqb =
415          QueryBuilders.rangeQuery(esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(parameter));
416      if (dateRange.hasLowerBound()) {
417        rqb.gte(dateRange.lowerEndpoint());
418      }
419      if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
420        rqb.lt(dateRange.upperEndpoint());
421      }
422      // For a match, the occurrence's date range must be entirely within the search query date
423      // range.
424      // i.e. Q:eventDate=1980 will match rec:eventDate=1980-02, but not
425      // rec:eventDate=1980-10-01/1982-02-02.
426      rqb.relation("within");
427      q = addNullableFieldPredicate(predicate, rqb);
428    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
429      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
430      RangeQueryBuilder rqb =
431          QueryBuilders.rangeQuery(esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(parameter));
432      if (dateRange.hasLowerBound()) {
433        rqb.gte(dateRange.lowerEndpoint());
434      }
435      if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
436        rqb.lt(dateRange.upperEndpoint());
437      }
438      // For a match, the occurrence's date range must be entirely within the search query date
439      // range.
440      // i.e. Q:eventDate=1980 will match rec:eventDate=1980-02, but not
441      // rec:eventDate=1980-10-01/1982-02-02.
442      rqb.relation("within");
443      q = addNullableFieldPredicate(predicate, rqb);
444    } else {
445      q =
446          QueryBuilders.termQuery(
447              getExactMatchOrVerbatimField(predicate),
448              parseParamValue(predicate.getValue(), parameter));
449    }
450
451    if (esFieldMapper.isNestedField(parameter)) {
452      queryData
453          .queryBuilder
454          .filter()
455          .add(
456              QueryBuilders.nestedQuery(esFieldMapper.getNestedPath(parameter), q, ScoreMode.None));
457      queryData.rawQueries = List.of(q);
458      queryData.nestedPath = esFieldMapper.getNestedPath(parameter);
459    } else {
460      queryData.queryBuilder.filter().add(q);
461    }
462  }
463
464  private final Function<String, Object> parseDate =
465      d -> "*".equals(d) ? null : IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDate(d);
466
467  private final Function<String, Object> parseInteger =
468      d -> "*".equals(d) ? null : Integer.parseInt(d);
469
470  private final Function<String, Object> parseDouble =
471      d -> "*".equals(d) ? null : Double.parseDouble(d);
472
473  public void visit(RangePredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData)
474      throws QueryBuildingException {
475
476    RangeQueryBuilder rqb =
477        QueryBuilders.rangeQuery(esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(predicate.getKey()));
478
479    if (Integer.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
480      initialiseRangeQuery(predicate, rqb, parseInteger);
481    } else if (Double.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
482      initialiseRangeQuery(predicate, rqb, parseDouble);
483    } else if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
484      initialiseRangeQuery(predicate, rqb, parseDate);
485    }
486
487    addFilterQuery(rqb, queryData, predicate.getKey());
488  }
489
490  private void initialiseRangeQuery(
491      RangePredicate<S> predicate, RangeQueryBuilder rqb, Function<String, Object> initialiser) {
492    if (predicate.getValue().getGte() != null) {
493      rqb.gte(initialiser.apply(predicate.getValue().getGte()));
494    }
495    if (predicate.getValue().getLte() != null) {
496      rqb.lte(initialiser.apply(predicate.getValue().getLte()));
497    }
498    if (predicate.getValue().getGt() != null) {
499      rqb.gt(initialiser.apply(predicate.getValue().getGt()));
500    }
501    if (predicate.getValue().getLt() != null) {
502      rqb.lt(initialiser.apply(predicate.getValue().getLt()));
503    }
504  }
505
506  private static LocalDate parseDate(String d) {
507    return "*".equals(d) ? null : IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDate(d);
508  }
509
510  /**
511   * handle greater than equals predicate
512   *
513   * @param predicate gte predicate
514   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
515   */
516  public void visit(GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
517    S parameter = predicate.getKey();
518    QueryBuilder q =
519        addNullableFieldPredicate(
520            predicate,
521            QueryBuilders.rangeQuery(esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(parameter))
522                .gte(parseParamValue(predicate.getValue(), parameter)));
523    addFilterQuery(q, queryData, predicate.getKey());
524  }
525
526  /**
527   * Adds an "is null" filter if the mapper instructs to. Used mostly in range queries to give
528   * specific semantics to null values.
529   */
530  private QueryBuilder addNullableFieldPredicate(Predicate predicate, QueryBuilder filter) {
531    if (predicate instanceof SimplePredicate
532        && esFieldMapper.includeNullInPredicate((SimplePredicate<S>) predicate)) {
533      return QueryBuilders.boolQuery()
534          .should(filter)
535          .should(
536              QueryBuilders.boolQuery()
537                  .mustNot(
538                      QueryBuilders.existsQuery(
539                          esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(
540                              ((SimplePredicate<S>) predicate).getKey()))));
541    }
542    return filter;
543  }
544
545  /**
546   * handles greater than predicate
547   *
548   * @param predicate greater than predicate
549   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
550   */
551  public void visit(GreaterThanPredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
552    S parameter = predicate.getKey();
553    QueryBuilder q =
554        addNullableFieldPredicate(
555            predicate,
556            QueryBuilders.rangeQuery(esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(parameter))
557                .gt(parseParamValue(predicate.getValue(), parameter)));
558    addFilterQuery(q, queryData, parameter);
559  }
560
561  /**
562   * handle IN Predicate
563   *
564   * @param predicate InPredicate
565   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
566   */
567  public void visit(InPredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
568    S parameter = predicate.getKey();
569
570    // EVENT_DATE needs special handling
571    if (paramEquals(parameter, OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE.name())) {
572      predicate
573          .getValues()
574          .forEach(
575              value -> {
576                try {
577                  BoolQueryBuilder shouldQueryBuilder = QueryBuilders.boolQuery();
578                  Predicate subPredicate =
579                      new EqualsPredicate<>(
580                          getParam(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE.name()).get(),
581                          value,
582                          predicate.isMatchCase(),
583                          getChecklistKey(predicate));
584                  visit(subPredicate, new QueryData(shouldQueryBuilder));
585                  queryData.queryBuilder.should(
586                      addNullableFieldPredicate(subPredicate, shouldQueryBuilder));
587                } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
588                  throw new RuntimeException(ex);
589                }
590              });
591    } else {
592
593      TermsQueryBuilder termsQueryBuilder =
594          QueryBuilders.termsQuery(
595              getExactMatchOrVerbatimField(predicate),
596              predicate.getValues().stream()
597                  .map(v -> parseParamValue(v, parameter))
598                  .collect(Collectors.toList()));
599
600      addFilterQuery(termsQueryBuilder, queryData, predicate.getKey());
601    }
602  }
603
604  /**
605   * handles less than or equals predicate
606   *
607   * @param predicate less than or equals
608   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
609   */
610  public void visit(LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
611    S parameter = predicate.getKey();
612    QueryBuilder q =
613        addNullableFieldPredicate(
614            predicate,
615            QueryBuilders.rangeQuery(esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(parameter))
616                .lte(parseParamValue(predicate.getValue(), parameter)));
617    addFilterQuery(q, queryData, parameter);
618  }
619
620  /**
621   * handles less than predicate
622   *
623   * @param predicate less than predicate
624   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
625   */
626  public void visit(LessThanPredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
627    S parameter = predicate.getKey();
628    QueryBuilder q =
629        addNullableFieldPredicate(
630            predicate,
631            QueryBuilders.rangeQuery(esFieldMapper.getExactMatchFieldName(parameter))
632                .lt(parseParamValue(predicate.getValue(), parameter)));
633    addFilterQuery(q, queryData, parameter);
634  }
635
636  /**
637   * handles like predicate
638   *
639   * @param predicate like predicate
640   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
641   */
642  public void visit(LikePredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
643    addFilterQuery(
644        QueryBuilders.wildcardQuery(getExactMatchOrVerbatimField(predicate), predicate.getValue()),
645        queryData,
646        predicate.getKey());
647  }
648
649  /**
650   * handles not predicate
651   *
652   * @param predicate NOT predicate
653   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
654   */
655  public void visit(NotPredicate predicate, QueryData queryData) throws QueryBuildingException {
656    BoolQueryBuilder mustNotQueryBuilder = QueryBuilders.boolQuery();
657    QueryData mustNotQueryData = new QueryData(mustNotQueryBuilder);
658    visit(predicate.getPredicate(), mustNotQueryData);
659    queryData.queryBuilder.mustNot(mustNotQueryBuilder);
660  }
661
662  /**
663   * handles within predicate
664   *
665   * @param within Within predicate
666   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
667   */
668  public void visit(WithinPredicate within, QueryData queryData) {
669    QueryBuilder q = buildGeoShapeQuery(within.getGeometry());
670    queryData.queryBuilder.filter(q);
671  }
672
673  public GeoShapeQueryBuilder buildGeoShapeQuery(String wkt) {
674    Geometry geometry;
675    try {
676      geometry = new WKTReader().read(wkt);
677    } catch (ParseException e) {
678      throw new IllegalArgumentException(e.getMessage(), e);
679    }
680
681    Function<Polygon, PolygonBuilder> polygonToBuilder =
682        polygon -> {
683          PolygonBuilder polygonBuilder =
684              new PolygonBuilder(
685                  new CoordinatesBuilder()
686                      .coordinates(
687                          normalizePolygonCoordinates(polygon.getExteriorRing().getCoordinates())));
688          for (int i = 0; i < polygon.getNumInteriorRing(); i++) {
689            polygonBuilder.hole(
690                new LineStringBuilder(
691                    new CoordinatesBuilder()
692                        .coordinates(
693                            normalizePolygonCoordinates(
694                                polygon.getInteriorRingN(i).getCoordinates()))));
695          }
696          return polygonBuilder;
697        };
698
699    String type =
700        "LinearRing".equals(geometry.getGeometryType())
701            ? "LINESTRING"
702            : geometry.getGeometryType().toUpperCase();
703
704    ShapeBuilder shapeBuilder = null;
705    if (("POINT").equals(type)) {
706      shapeBuilder = new PointBuilder(geometry.getCoordinate().x, geometry.getCoordinate().y);
707    } else if ("LINESTRING".equals(type)) {
708      shapeBuilder = new LineStringBuilder(Arrays.asList(geometry.getCoordinates()));
709    } else if ("POLYGON".equals(type)) {
710      shapeBuilder = polygonToBuilder.apply((Polygon) geometry);
711    } else if ("MULTIPOLYGON".equals(type)) {
712      // multipolygon
713      MultiPolygonBuilder multiPolygonBuilder = new MultiPolygonBuilder();
714      for (int i = 0; i < geometry.getNumGeometries(); i++) {
715        multiPolygonBuilder.polygon(polygonToBuilder.apply((Polygon) geometry.getGeometryN(i)));
716      }
717      shapeBuilder = multiPolygonBuilder;
718    } else {
719      throw new IllegalArgumentException(type + " shape is not supported");
720    }
721
722    try {
723      return QueryBuilders.geoShapeQuery(
724              esFieldMapper.getGeoShapeField(), shapeBuilder.buildGeometry())
725          .relation(ShapeRelation.WITHIN);
726    } catch (IOException e) {
727      throw new IllegalStateException(e.getMessage(), e);
728    }
729  }
730
731  /** Eliminates consecutive duplicates. The order is preserved. */
732  static Coordinate[] normalizePolygonCoordinates(Coordinate[] coordinates) {
733    List<Coordinate> normalizedCoordinates = new ArrayList<>();
734
735    // we always have to keep the fist and last coordinates
736    int i = 0;
737    normalizedCoordinates.add(i++, coordinates[0]);
738
739    for (int j = 1; j < coordinates.length; j++) {
740      if (!coordinates[j - 1].equals(coordinates[j])) {
741        normalizedCoordinates.add(i++, coordinates[j]);
742      }
743    }
744
745    return normalizedCoordinates.toArray(new Coordinate[0]);
746  }
747
748  /**
749   * handles geoDistance predicate
750   *
751   * @param geoDistance GeoDistance predicate
752   * @param queryData data with the root query builder and the nested path
753   */
754  public void visit(GeoDistancePredicate geoDistance, QueryData queryData) {
755    QueryBuilder q = buildGeoDistanceQuery(geoDistance.getGeoDistance());
756    queryData.queryBuilder.filter(q);
757  }
758
759  /** Builds a GeoDistance query. */
760  private GeoDistanceQueryBuilder buildGeoDistanceQuery(DistanceUnit.GeoDistance geoDistance) {
761    return QueryBuilders.geoDistanceQuery(esFieldMapper.getGeoDistanceField())
762        .distance(geoDistance.getDistance().toString())
763        .point(geoDistance.getLatitude(), geoDistance.getLongitude());
764  }
765
766  /**
767   * handles ISNOTNULL Predicate
768   *
769   * @param predicate ISNOTNULL predicate
770   */
771  public void visit(IsNotNullPredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
772    addFilterQuery(
773        QueryBuilders.existsQuery(getExactMatchFieldName(predicate)),
774        queryData,
775        predicate.getParameter());
776  }
777
778  /**
779   * handles ISNULL Predicate
780   *
781   * @param predicate ISNULL predicate
782   */
783  public void visit(IsNullPredicate<S> predicate, QueryData queryData) {
784    addFilterQuery(
785        QueryBuilders.boolQuery()
786            .mustNot(QueryBuilders.existsQuery(getExactMatchFieldName(predicate))),
787        queryData,
788        predicate.getParameter());
789  }
790
791  private void visit(Object object, QueryData queryData) throws QueryBuildingException {
792    Method method;
793    try {
794      method = getClass().getMethod("visit", object.getClass(), QueryData.class);
795    } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
796      log.warn(
797          "Visit method could not be found. That means a unknown Predicate has been passed", e);
798      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown Predicate", e);
799    }
800    try {
801      method.invoke(this, object, queryData);
802    } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
803      log.error(
804          "This error shouldn't occur if all visit methods are public. Probably a programming error",
805          e);
806      throw new RuntimeException(e);
807    } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
808      log.info("Exception thrown while building the query", e);
809      throw new QueryBuildingException(e);
810    }
811  }
812
813  private void addFilterQuery(QueryBuilder q, QueryData queryData, S searchParameter) {
814    if (esFieldMapper.isNestedField(searchParameter)) {
815      queryData
816          .queryBuilder
817          .filter()
818          .add(
819              QueryBuilders.nestedQuery(
820                  esFieldMapper.getNestedPath(searchParameter), q, ScoreMode.None));
821      queryData.rawQueries = List.of(q);
822      queryData.nestedPath = esFieldMapper.getNestedPath(searchParameter);
823    } else {
824      queryData.queryBuilder.filter().add(q);
825    }
826  }
827
828  @Data
829  public static class QueryData {
830    BoolQueryBuilder queryBuilder;
831    // raw queries that go inside a nested query. For complex predicates they need to be
832    // grouped into the same query so it's convenient to have them separated in this field.
833    // Otherwise they'd be inside a nested query
834    List<QueryBuilder> rawQueries;
835    String nestedPath;
836
837    QueryData(BoolQueryBuilder queryBuilder) {
838      this.queryBuilder = queryBuilder;
839    }
840
841    boolean isNested() {
842      return nestedPath != null;
843    }
844  }
845
846  private boolean paramEquals(S param1, String param2) {
847    Optional<S> param2Opt = getParam(param2);
848    return param2Opt.isPresent() && param1 == param2Opt.get();
849  }
850
851  protected abstract Optional<S> getParam(String name);
852}
